Description.Text: other amenities/services: The complex consists of 4 buildings, with a total capacity of 14 apartments with Central heating, Safe deposit box, Fully equipped kitchen, Direct dial telephone, DVD / CD player, 4 suites equipped with washing machine, All suites with iron and ironing board, one suite in the ground floor is suitable for disabled guests.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Katalagari village - 300m, Heraklion town - 20km, Arhanes village - 2km, Nearest beach to the north 22 km, nearest beach to the south 28 km. Nearest airport: Heraklion airport - 18km.
